name: IMMZ.DT.07.Rotavirus
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Rotavirus vaccine according to the defined schedule

action.title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - No Doses
action.description: Provide Rotavirus immunizations – using the "Rotavirus vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2-3 scheme depends on product)

action.title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - 1 Rotavirus dose previously given 2 dose scheme

action.title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - 2 Rotavirus dose previously given 3 dose scheme
action.description: Provide Rotavirus immunizations – using the "Rotavirus vaccine immunization schedule" – minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose assuming 3 dose scheme
